array.string: <b:t>Here is the recipe for baking </b:t> <b:ot tag="a"> 30 cookies: </b:ot> <b:t>: </b:t> <b:ot tag="b">240g butter</b:ot> <b:t>,</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">150g sugar</b:ot> <b:t>,</b:t> <b:ot tag="d">2 eggs</b:ot> <b:t>, and</b:t> <b:ot tag="e">300g flour.</b:ot> <b:t>How much of each ingredient is needed to make 1 cookie?</b:t>

<b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">240g butter</b:ot> <b:op op="รท" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">30 cookies</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="9">9</b:ot> <b:t>g butter per cookie</b:t>

<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">150g sugar</b:ot> <b:op op="รท" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">30 cookies</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="5">5</b:ot> <b:t>g sugar per cookie</b:t>

<b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">2 eggs</b:ot> <b:op op="รท" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">30 cookies</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="2/30">2/30</b:ot> <b:t>eggs per cookie</b:t>

<b:ot tag="e" enabled="no">300g flour</b:ot> <b:op op="รท" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">30 cookies</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="10">10</b:ot> <b:t>g flour per cookie</b:t>
